mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.area_cd ,a.area_nm ,b.area_city_cd ,b.area_city_nm ,c.areacity_admin_cd ,c.areacity_admin_nm ,d.fest_cd ,d.fest_nm FROM Area AS a ,Area_City AS b ,Area_City_Admin AS c ,Festival AS d where a.area_cd=b.area_cd AND b.area_city_cd=c.area_city_cd AND c.areacity_admin_cd=d.areacity_admin_cd) AS f WHERE f.fest_cd=(#{fest_cd})
